pageContent: Prostate cancer is often a complex disease and one in which many aspects of the disease and the affected patient must be taken into consideration before decisions about diagnostic work-up, treatments, follow-up, etc. can be made. The current chapter reflects the current recommendations of the European Prostate Cancer Guideline Group made on the basis of criteria of evidence-based medicine after extensive review of the literature available up to December 2005.

metaData.source:
Molecular and genetic prognostic factors of prostate cancer
https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/12910365/
